mapper.insert: insert into recommend_board_tb (title, content, user_id, view_count, origin_name, file_name) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{viewCount}, #{originName}, #{fileName});
mapper.update: update recommend_board_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, originName = #{originName}, fileName = #{fileName} where id = #{id}
update recommend_board_tb set view_count = view_count + 1 where id = #{id};
